overload.extra: Every interruption adds minutes; by the end of the day it turns into delays, mistakes, and burnout.

missed.title: Appointments that slip away
missed.text: They ask about a vaccination appointment. You take 2 hours to respond. The owner doesn't reply. Client lost.
missed.extra: Most compare multiple clinics; the first clear answer usually wins the booking.

manual.title: Manual reminders
manual.text: Pending vaccines, forgotten checkups, chronic treatment follow-ups. Everything requires manual calls or messages.
manual.extra: Without a system, follow-up depends on memory and calendar gaps that rarely exist.

hero.title: Solution
hero.heading: Intelligent Care System for Veterinary Clinics
hero.subheading: Handle pet-owner questions with veterinary criteria, triage urgent cases, and book appointments with no friction.
hero.claimDark: Intelligent care that turns conversations into veterinary appointments.

what.title: What it is
what.p1: A system that handles pet-owner conversations in natural language with a professional veterinary tone, helping turn questions into appointments and follow-ups.
what.p2: Built for independent veterinary clinics where every inquiry matters: emergencies, vaccines, checkups, and chronic follow-ups.

day.title: What it does day to day
items: Answers questions about symptoms, vaccines, and availability 24/7.
Triage: separates emergencies (vomiting, accidents) from routine requests (grooming, vaccines).
Collects key details: pet, symptoms, vaccine history, schedule preferences.
Proposes the next appointment: urgent visit, vaccination, checkup, or surgery.
Sends automatic vaccine reminders and chronic-treatment follow-ups.

how.title: How it works
steps: Define your triage protocol and key questions for each type of inquiry.
Configure the flow: symptoms -> urgent/routine -> appointment proposal.
Enable escalation rules for complex cases or severe red flags.
Start handling conversations and review the cases that need human attention.

guardrails.title: Control, safety, and veterinary criteria
items: Detects red flags and escalates real emergencies.
Does not diagnose: guides and proposes a vet appointment.
Confirms details before booking (pet, vaccines, allergies).
Keeps a professional tone for worried owners.

fit.title: Real veterinary situations
fit.description: The system adapts to your clinic's rhythm.

aesthetics.title: Park accident
aesthetics.situation: Owner texts on Sunday: 'My dog cut her paw on glass at the park'.
aesthetics.problem: No response until Monday. They went to another emergency clinic.
aesthetics.change: Immediate response, severity assessment, and a same-day urgent appointment.

dental.title: Cat vaccination
dental.situation: Client asks: 'When is the next vaccine due for my two cats?'.
dental.problem: Front desk must search history, confirm dates, and coordinate scheduling.
dental.change: System checks history and automatically proposes dates.

physio.title: Senior checkup
physio.situation: A 12+ year old dog needs annual blood work and a checkup.
physio.problem: Owner forgets to schedule and issues are detected late.
physio.change: Automatic reminder with a proposed appointment based on age and protocol.

veterinary.title: Deworming
veterinary.situation: A 3-month old puppy needs the second deworming dose.
veterinary.problem: First-time owners don't know when it's due or what to use.
veterinary.change: Automatic protocol guidance and an appointment for in-clinic application.

emergency.title: Night emergencies
emergency.situation: Owner texts at midnight: 'My dog is vomiting blood'.
emergency.problem: No response until morning. They went to a 24h emergency clinic.
emergency.change: Immediate response, urgency classification, and prioritized appointment.

vaccines.title: Vaccine reminders
vaccines.situation: The annual booster is due but the owner doesn't remember.
vaccines.change: Automated messages with an appointment proposal for vaccination.

chronic.title: Chronic follow-up
chronic.situation: A diabetic cat needs monthly glucose checks.
chronic.change: Automatic reminders and easy rescheduling via WhatsApp.

multiservice.title: Multiple services
multiservice.situation: Mixed inquiries: consults, grooming, lab work, surgeries.
multiservice.change: Automatic classification by service type and duration.
